item.title: Mary Varghese Residential Complex children’s carol
item.dc:creator: Anand Bhaskar
item.description:
Mary Varghese Residential Complex children's carol.

The post Mary Varghese Residential Complex children’s carol appeared first on Campus Events.
item.content:encoded:
The children of Mary Varghese Residential Complex visited houses and flats in the Rehab campus on Christmas eve, singing carols and spreading the joy of Christmas. They were accompanied by Dr. Sudha Jasmine, Dr. Moses Kirubairaj and Dr. Divya Muliyil. Residents welcomed the carol party with refreshments and little treats and joined in the celebration.

The post Mary Varghese Residential Complex children’s carol appeared first on Campus Events.
